scripts.deploy: wrangler deploy --outdir dist --upload-source-maps --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) --var SENTRY_RELEASE:$(sentry-cli releases propose-version)
scripts.sentry:sourcemaps: _SENTRY_RELEASE=$(sentry-cli releases propose-version) && sentry-cli releases new $_SENTRY_RELEASE --org=joshua-carmack --project=nets-w4trc-org && sentry-cli sourcemaps upload --org=joshua-carmack --project=nets-w4trc-org --release=$_SENTRY_RELEASE --strip-prefix 'dist\..' dist
